company.name: Stichting MOC Huis aan het Water

profile_positions.company: Stichting MOC Huis aan het Water
profile_positions.title: PR / Communicatie / Vrijwilliger coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Product Development Manager

- Senior product developer for the ready-to-wear label Ready to Fish and the couture label ILJA
- Managing the Product Development / Design and Atelier teams for both labels including interns
- Managing the freelancers (pattern makers, seamstresses, designers, ateliers and other experts ) needed for the label ILJA 
- Managing the fitting process (budget, fitting models, fitting, correspondence with the suppliers)
- Responsible for the managing of the development budgets for both labels
- Responsible for meeting targets set for on time delivery, overall margin, stock levels, fulfillment, quality standards
- Responsible for setting up and maintaining the sourcing strategy that is in line with the set targets for budget, profit and on time delivery
- Responsible for price negotiations, fabric orders, sample order placement for both labels and bulk order placement for ILJA only
- Participate in the set up and execution of the overall company structure, job descriptions, procedures, meeting structures and roles & responsibilities (part of the management team)
- Partly responsible for the set up and execution of the couture shows in Paris
- Vendor management; evaluate, develop and build relationships with suppliers in Portugal, Croatia, Hungary and Bulgaria
- Create, distribute and monitor the annual calendar for the Product Development cycle
- Set up and maintain the quality manual for the Ilja Visser Group with regards to how to measure, standardization of finishings, labels /hangtags requirements, quality standards, safety standards and regulations
profile_positions.title: Product Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage the product development + production teams and the fit coordinators of the brands Cakewalk and Jottum
- Responsible for meeting targets set for on time delivery, overall margin, stock levels, fulfillment, quality standards, safety regulations
- Responsible for setting up and maintaining the sourcing strategy that is in line with the set targets for profit, on time delivery and minimum stock levels
- Responsible for price negotiations, fabric orders, sample orders and bulk order placement
- Vendor management; evaluate, develop and build relationships with agencies and vendors in Tunisia, Europe and Asia
- Participate in the set up of the overall company structure, job descriptions, procedures, meeting structures and roles & responsibilities
- Create, distribute and monitor the annual calendar for the total Waalwear Kids organization
- Participate in the set up of the company structure, procedures and roles & responsibilities
- Set up and maintain the production website with WWK quality standards, safety standards, regulations and fit standards
- Responsible for handling customer product complaints and claim settlement with vendors and agents
profile_positions.title: Sourcing, Buying & Production Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage the Youth Product Development and Manufacturing team existing of 3 Product Developers, 2 Production Coordinators and 2 Pattern and Fit Coordinators
- Manage product from Concept to Shop floor, by ensuring that design is translated into a commercial product that delivers margin and check out performance.
- Translate business plans and budgets of sales teams (retail and wholesale) into assortment planning, gross profit planning, sourcing and production planning
- Responsible for price negotiations, fabric orders, sample orders and bulk order placement
- Monitor and manage vendors and agents throughout Europe and Asia
- Responsible for on time delivery, overall margin, stock levels, fulfillment, quality standards and safety regulations
- Create and monitor the annual calendar of the Youth team
- Responsible for overall product fit
- Responsible for the development of short term programs
- Responsible for handling customer product complaints and claim settlement with vendors and agents
profile_positions.title: Product Development and Manufacturing Manager Youth

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for development of the salesmen sample collection in cooperation with design
- Responsible for research and development of fabrics and trimmings
- Responsible for the follow up of the production after creation of the salesmen sample 
- Monitor fit of salesmen sample and production
- Price negotiations with vendors and agents
- Contact person for sales countries
